member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GoInstruments
member.summary: Provide static properties describing this version of GoInstruments.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GoInstruments.#ctor
member.summary: The only purpose of this constructor is to do a license check.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GoInstruments.Version
member.summary: Return the version of GoInstruments being used.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GoInstruments.VersionName
member.summary: Return the name of the version of GoInstruments being used.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GoInstrumentsLicenseProvider
member.summary: This is an internal class used to implement licensing.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GoInstrumentsLicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method implements licensing.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleLabelStyle
member.summary: Specifies the style used to layout tick labels.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleLabelStyle.Left
member.summary: A style for the layout of tick labels for
member.remarks: All ticks are labeled on the end that is left of the 's path.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleLabelStyle.Right
member.summary: A style for the layout of tick labels for
member.remarks: All ticks are labeled on the end that is right of the 's path.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleLabelStyle.AlternateStartLeft
member.summary: A style for the layout of tick labels for
member.remarks: Alternates which side of the tick gets labeled. The first label tick is labeled to the left.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleLabelStyle.AlternateStartRight
member.summary: A style for the layout of tick labels for
member.remarks: Alternates which side of the tick gets labeled. The first label tick is labeled to the right.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale
member.summary: An implementation of the IGraduatedScale class, used to depict a scale as a path between two end points, representing a minimum and maximum value, with all the points along that path representing uniformly delineated values.
member.remarks: This class constructs an instance of in order to do a license check.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale
member.summary: The IGraduatedScale interface provides a range of values that a scale may display, along with methods to map a value to a display point.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale.GetPointForValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a point that represents the given value.
member.param: a PointF in document coordinates

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale.GetValueAtPoint(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns the value which would be represented at a given point.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale.IntersectionWithLine(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Double@)
member.summary: Returns true if the line defined by points p1 and p2 intersect with the path of the scale; outputs the associated value at that point with the out parameter val.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value represented on the scale.
member.remarks: Standard behavior dictates the scale be inclusive of the minimum and maximum values.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value represented on the scale.
member.remarks: Standard behavior dictates the scale be inclusive of the minimum and maximum values

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.IGraduatedScale.Range
member.summary: Gets the extent of the scale's range.
member.remarks: Standard behavior returns the difference between the scale's Maximum and Minimum values.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.GetLabelString(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the text string that a label marking the given value would contain.
member.param: the double floating point number that is labeled
member.remarks: If the value of is non-null and non-empty, this method rounds the value to an integer and uses that as an index into that list to get an object that is converted to a String to be returned. Otherwise this returns the string produced by formatting the value using . See also .

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.GetLabelCenter(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the point at which the Label should be centered.
member.param: the double floating point number that is labeled
member.remarks: See also .

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.PaintLabel(System.Drawing.Graphics,Northwoods.Go.GoView,System.Drawing.PointF,System.String)
member.summary: Responsible for properly painting a label for the given value parameter.
member.param: the reference point for where the label should be drawn, computed by
the text of the label to be drawn, computed by
member.remarks: If you override this method, you may also need to override to account for the potentially increased area where text or any other decorations may be drawn. An alternative way to change where a label is drawn is to override so that it returns the point you want.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.Paint(System.Drawing.Graphics,Northwoods.Go.GoView)
member.summary: Render this object to a Graphics object.
member.remarks: This assumes that it need not draw any shadow.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.MakePath
member.summary: Make sure that whenever we reconstruct the main GraphicsPath for this shape, we also reconstruct the paths for the ticks.
member.remarks: This calls both and an internal method for computing and remembering tick marks.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.MakeAllGraphicsPaths
member.summary: Return an enumerable holding all the GraphicsPath objects needed to draw the principal path and all tick marks.
member.returns: an IEnumerable of GraphicsPaths, which must not be modified.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.ComputePath(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)
member.summary: Determines the main path of the . Does not include tick marks.
member.param: a GraphicsPath to be modified
member.remarks: The abstract implementation does nothing.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.ExpandPaintBounds(System.Drawing.RectangleF,Northwoods.Go.GoView)
member.summary: The paint bounds needs to include tick marks and labels.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.ChangeValue(Northwoods.Go.GoChangedEventArgs,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handle undo and redo changes.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value represented on the .
member.value: This value must be less than .

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value represented on the .
member.value: This value must be greater than .

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.Range
member.summary: Gets the range of values represented by the
member.value: This is just the minus the .

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickUnit
member.summary: Gets or sets the difference between two consecutive values marked by minor ticks.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickBase
member.summary: Gets or sets the base value which is marked with a tick.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw tick marks.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the pen width of the tick marks.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickLengthLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets the length that each minor tick is drawn to the left of the 's path.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickLengthRight
member.summary: Gets or sets the length that each minor tick is drawn to the right of the scale's path.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickMajorFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets when to draw emphasized tick marks.
member.value: This defaults to 10. The value must be positive.
member.remarks: A tick mark will be drawn as a major tick mark every TickMajorFrequency ticks. If this equals 1, then only major tick marks will be drawn.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickMajorWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the pen width of major tick marks.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickMajorLengthRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the relative length of major tick marks compared to minor ones.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.TickLabels
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to draw tick labels at major tick marks.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.LabelStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the layout style with which the tick labels are drawn.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.LabelFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets how often to label major tick marks.
member.value: The default value is 1, to label every major tick mark.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.LabelDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance at which labels are centered away from the tick mark.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.LabelFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string for formatting label values.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.LabelTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance of a GoText that contains the font, size, and other text properties used when drawing labels.
member.value: An instance of a GoText; the value must not be null.
member.remarks: This GoText object must not be part of any GoGroup or any GoLayer; it is just used as a template for drawing labels.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.LabelChoices
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of labels to use for integral values starting at zero.
member.value: By default this is null, so will just format the value. This value can be shared by multiple instances of a GraduatedScale.

remarks.para: This property makes it easy to use a scale to display a range of non-numerical values for the labels. Just set this property and then set scale.Maximum = scale.LabelChoices.Count-1 and scale.TickMajorFrequency = 1.

Modifying the items in the list is not controlled. Any such changes are not recorded by the undo manager. Only replacing the list is recorded for undo/redo, and even then, it is only the reference to an IList that is remembered and restored.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.Bounds
member.summary: Whenever the size and/or position is changed, we need to recalculate the GraphicsPath.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScale.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the scale, in document units.
member.remarks: By default this is just the distance between the points on the scale for the minimum and maximum values.

member.summary: A subclass of , which represents the scale as an ellipse defined by a RectangleF, a starting angle, and a sweep angle.

member.summary: Finds the value that corresponds to the point where the scale and the line defined by p1 and p2 interesct.

member.summary: Returns the value that is associated with point p.

member.summary: Returns the point on the that corresponds to the given value.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleElliptical.DoResize(Northwoods.Go.GoView,System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Int32,Northwoods.Go.GoInputState,System.Drawing.SizeF,System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Called when a user resizes this object.
member.remarks: This is normally called from . By default it just calls , allowing reshaping if this object's property is true and the 's last input's property is true. The resulting RectangleF value is used as this object's new if is true or if is . Override if you want to constrain the user's resizing of this object without regard to the actual view or input events causing the resize.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleElliptical.AddSelectionHandles(Northwoods.Go.GoSelection,Northwoods.Go.GoObject)
member.summary: Display the appropriate selected appearance. Reshape selection handles are located at the start point and end point.

member.summary: Determine if a given point is inside and on this object.
member.returns: Returns true if the point is within the area defined by sweeping a minor tickmark around the elliptical scale.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.GraduatedScaleElliptical.ComputePath(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)
member.summary: Determines the main path of the . Does not include tick marks.

member.summary: Calculates the two end points of a tick mark corresponding to the given value.

member.summary: Compute the label center to be appropriately positioned relative to the tick marks.

member.summary: Handle undo and redo changes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the arc length (in degrees) through which the is drawn.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator
member.summary: An abstract class designed to visually represent a specific quantitative value.
member.remarks: provides a basis for indicators designed to interact with an implementation of to indicate values that correspond to specific graphical points, determined by the . However, it is possible to create an that does not rely on an instance of , and the information needed to indicate specific values would be contained internally. This would be useful when the value system does not correspond to graphical points, such as a color scale system.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.ChangedValue
member.summary: This is a subhint.

member.summary: Make sure the reference to the is maintained.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.ValidValue(System.Double)
member.summary: A function used to check the validity of the given value.
member.returns: If the given value is valid, returns that value. Else, returns the valid value that is "closest" to the given value.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.QuantizeValue(System.Double)
member.summary: A function used to ensure valid values within the quantized value system.
member.returns: If is true, returns an acceptable quantized value that is closest to the given value. Otherwise it just returns the given value.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.OnActionActivated(Northwoods.Go.GoView,Northwoods.Go.GoInputEventArgs)
member.summary: This method saves the original value when the indicator is starting to be manipulated by the user.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.OnActionAdjusted(Northwoods.Go.GoView,Northwoods.Go.GoInputEventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called by as the user is adjusting the object, normally by a mouse drag.
member.param: the that the input event occurred in
the describing the input event
member.remarks: By default this just sets the according to the current input point. This calls to determine the indicator's new value for the current mouse point. This will get called repeatedly as the user drags the mouse around. When setting the Value, this method temporarily sets to true.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.OnAction(Northwoods.Go.GoView,Northwoods.Go.GoInputEventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called by when the mouse is released, to set the according to the current input point, within a transaction.
member.param: the that the input event occurred in
the describing the input event
member.remarks: This calls to determine the indicator's new value for the current mouse point.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.OnActionCancelled(Northwoods.Go.GoView)
member.summary: This method is called by when the tool is being cancelled.
member.remarks: This just restores the to its original value, remembered at the time this indicator was activated.

member.name: M:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.GetValueForPoint(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: This method is called by and to determine the appropriate scale value given the current mouse point.
member.param: a PointF in document coordinates
member.returns: By default this just returns the 's .

member.summary: Change the cursor to Cursors.Hand if the user can modify the value of this indicator interactively.
member.returns: true if the 's Cursor is changed to Cursors.Hand

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale with which the indicator is associated.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.Quantized
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the indicator is forced to have discrete values. If true, is restricted to values that follow (value - ) mod = 0.
member.remarks: Setting this property does not actually change the . If you want to make sure the is "quantized" correctly, you will need to set it explicitly.

members.member:
Gets or sets the base value which is allowed when is true. .
Setting this property does not actually change the . If you want to make sure the is "quantized" correctly, you will need to set it explicitly.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Instruments.Indicator.QuantizeUnit
